os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: All POSIX (Linux/BSD/UNIX-like OSes)

name: scrot-puush
short_description:
dash script
depends on dash (can be modified to run on bash/sh/zsh) (chosen for speed (loading)), puush script (by Nick Hu), xclip and grep
emulates how puush works on windows (instant full window picture take, automatic upload and posts url into clipboard)
utilizes middle-man files in /tmp, automatically deleted
feel free to modify scrot quality targets
summary: dash script to emulate puush usage as it is on windows
